Title: Never Forget I Love You
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Craig Gore (teleplay by), Tim Walsh (teleplay by), Ryan Maldonado (story), Eduardo Javier Canto (story)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: When a woman's decapitated body found in Lake Michigan is connected to Voight's social group, Lindsay worries that his relationship with the group could affect his ability to see the case objectively.
